images.name: hero-banner
images.prompt: Modern tech startup hero banner: abstract flowing gradient in blue and purple, geometric shapes, professional and innovative feel, clean design with negative space on the left for text overlay

images.name: about-team
images.prompt: Abstract illustration representing teamwork and collaboration: interconnected nodes and lines forming a network, warm orange and teal color palette, modern flat design style

images.name: services-icon-1
images.prompt: Minimalist 3D icon representing cloud computing: stylized cloud with connected nodes, soft blue gradient background, clean isometric perspective, professional tech aesthetic

images.name: services-icon-2
images.prompt: Minimalist 3D icon representing data analytics: abstract bar chart with glowing data points, purple and blue gradient, isometric view, matching style to cloud icon

images.name: services-icon-3
images.prompt: Minimalist 3D icon representing AI and machine learning: stylized brain made of circuit patterns, glowing neural connections, blue and cyan colors, isometric perspective

images.name: testimonials-bg
images.prompt: Subtle abstract background pattern: soft flowing waves in light gray and white, minimal and elegant, professional business aesthetic, suitable for overlaying text

images.name: cta-background
images.prompt: Bold gradient background for call-to-action section: dynamic diagonal gradient from deep purple to vibrant blue, subtle geometric patterns, energetic and modern feel

images.name: blog-placeholder
images.prompt: Generic tech blog post thumbnail: abstract digital landscape with code elements floating in space, futuristic atmosphere, blue and white color scheme
